name: completionist
description: A Roblox game built with Rojo

scripts.check: npm run format:check && npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.fix: npm run format && npm run lint:fix
scripts.test: npm run install-packages && npm run test:build
scripts.test:watch: concurrently "rojo serve test.project.json" "echo 'Connect to test server in Roblox Studio'"
